reviewText: This is an excellent dvd. If you have a counterbalance/countermarch loom and are struggling to warp it up this will resolve your problems.

This is a very clear, thorough, easy to understand explanation of the Swedish method of warping a loom from back to front.  The techniques explained can be adapted to any type of loom from jack to counterbalance to countermarch.  It is a must-have for your weaving library.
